alert.note: Alert for Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 4:56PM EDT until September 09 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TIOGA COUNTY... At 455 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ogdensburg, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. A tornado warning is also in effect for the same area. Take cover now! Locations impacted include... Blossburg and Ogdensburg. This includes State Road 14 from Roaring Branch to the Bradford County line. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
